*Clusters from open KB DBpedia has been generated by running query on DBpedia SPARQL endpoint: http://dbpedia-live.openlinksw.com/sparql 

*Sample query to check 100 name pairs :

select distinct ?s ?o
where {?s dbo:wikiPageRedirects ?o .
?s rdf:type dbo:Company .
?o rdf:type dbo:Company } limit 100

*All variations in DBpedia are directed to 1 single variation which can be used to cluster all the variations of an entity.
